title: Snow Day Gnar
body:
Gnar is my main and i love hes snow day skin and i know that it is only available around the holidays but if i shoot u a decent fan art will riot lend me the skin. 

Ps. i know someones gonna flame me for asking lol

replies.body: The cute and cuddly Snow Day Gnar is a[ legacy skin](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).  He won't be available in the store at all times, but you can bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page should he make an appearance.  You can test your luck with hextech chests or mystery gifting, though.  I hope that helps!
